attributes.action: Amendments to Hobby/Exhibitors Breeding Licence for Pedigree Dogs and Cats
attributes.background: It is our hobby not a business. We put blood, sweat, tears and heartache into our passion and the rewards we get are amazing and we are all very proud of the dogs we exhibit and go all the way to Crufts with and the lovely happy, healthy litters they produce.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
